mapper.insert: INSERT INTO report (reporter_id, reported_id, reported_type, description, status, created_at) VALUES (#{reporter_id}, #{reported_id}, #{reported_type, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, #{description}, #{status, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, NOW(6))
mapper.update: UPDATE report SET status = #{status, typeHandler=org.apache.ibatis.type.EnumTypeHandler}, processed_at = NOW(6) WHERE report_id = #{report_id}
